title: Retro 80s Synth & Orchestral Horror
description: Twenty one tracks with the style of 80s Retro Horror and sci-fi nostalgia featuring epic orchestral and synth music inspired by many classic movies and video games.   Cinematic melodic themes and background level music perfect for all your modern games.
longDescription:
https://soundcloud.com/cris-robles-music/sets/retro-80s-synth-orchestral/


Twenty one tracks with the style of 80s Retro Horror and sci-fi nostalgia featuring epic orchestral and synth music inspired by many classic movies and video games. 


Cinematic melodic themes and background level music perfect for all your modern games. 


This collection includes: 

  • 12 original tracks of dramatic, eerie, ominous, creepy and scary music written for orchestra featuring piano, celesta, harpsichord and church organ. 
  • 9 original retro synth horror nostalgia tracks in the style of 80s video game, TV and film composers.


Killer music for your sci-fi, horror, thriller, apocalyptic, doomsday and zombie outbreak games!


Written and produced by Cris Hoffman.
